dt: {bc}a potion, drug, or charm held to have the power to arouse sexual passion

et: Middle French {it}philtre{/it}, from Latin {it}philtrum{/it}, from Greek {it}philtron{/it}; akin to Greek {it}philos{/it} dear
shortdef: a potion credited with magical power
a potion, drug, or charm held to have the power to arouse sexual passion
